author: gballet
content: I've been told binary tries have been mentioned during the last ACD. To be clear, work on it is still ongoing with a prototype (several, actually). I also have a PR draft that I will share here in the next few days. In the mean time, https://ethresear.ch/t/binary-trie-format/7621 is the discussion thread.

author: gballet
content: I have also published an article discussing some of the design trade-offs at https://medium.com/@gballet/structure-of-a-binary-state-tree-part-1-48c587836d2f
